summary: Place a banner anywhere you want, tell the world whose side you are on.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][size=5][b][center]Raise Your Banner
[/center]
[/b][/size][/font]This mod allows the player to quickly place a Banner anywhere, displayed on a wooden post. Using a "Scroll of Raise Your Banner," you can add extra ambiance and immersion to your player home, camp site, or battle field. Easily remove the banner from the world just by activating it, and it'll be back in your pocket for later.


[size=1]This is currently a BETA version, and only has one Imperial banner placed in the world (On the strategy table in Dragonsreach. I know it says it's stealing--just don't get caught taking it; as soon as you use it, it will forget the stolen tag. I wanted it somewhere easy to find for testing purposes). When I have received feedback on possible issues and have all the various factions banners created and added to lists, then I will take this mod out of BETA and call it v1.1.[/size]

[size=1]Thanks to redditor /u/kyste for the great idea.Â [/size]

[size=1]You can always use "help raise" in console to find the code for the scroll, then "player.additem xxxxxxxx 1" where xxxxxxxx is the provided id. This way you can try using multiple banners at once, or avoid going to Dragonsreach for whatever reason.[/size]

[size=1]As a final note: Until I have released the final version, I do not want my work copied, altered, or uploaded anywhere else or by anyone else other than me.[/size]
author: Antiwater572

files.name: Raise Your Banner 1.2b
files.changelogHtml:
1.2b Raise Your Banner:
-Still in BETA
-Still only Imperial banner (found in Dragonsreach)
-Banner should appear on pole now
-Pole should be activate-able (should disappear and a new "Scroll of Raise Your Banner" added to player inventory.
